name: heritability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability of a disease or characteristic to be passed from a parent or grandparent to a child through the genes: The heritability of the condition was found to be low based on a sample of 1,000 patients and their offspring. Autism has been shown to have a high rate of heritability. Related word
heritable
More examplesFewer examplesOne way that scientists can determine the heritability of size is to breed together sets of parents of different sizes, and then observe the size of the offspring.
